text:
@piersmorgan @RishiSunak No thanks, they have all supported #RacistBorris and the negligence through #CoronaVirus that has cost 65000 lives so far.

Not one has spoke out, not one admitted fault, they are all culpable.

The entire lot need removing.

Time for #kierstarmer
